summary: Here I go again with a new follower. Hope she will be accepted as well as my others.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffd966][size=5][u]

Zoe-Wood Elf[/u] [/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Class[/size][/color][size=4]-[color=#ff7700]Combat Ranger[/color][/size]
[color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Perks[/size][/color][size=3]-[color=#dd7e6b]Critical Shot,Hunters Discipline,Ranger, & LightFoot[/color][/size]
[color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Voice Type[/size][/color][size=4]-[color=#45818e]Female Dark Elf[/color][/size][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Essential and Marriageable[/size][/color]
[color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Outfit[/size][/color][size=4]-[/size][color=#45818e]Blacksmith Variant[/color]
[size=4][color=#6fa8dc]Levels with player[/color]-[color=#9fc5e8]2 to 150[/color]
[color=#6fa8dc]Location[/color]- [i][color=#38761D]Jorrvaskr[/color] [/i][/size][color=#38761D]Ground Level[/color]
[/font][/center][size=2]
[left][/left]
[/size][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffd966]Zoe[/color] is a female Wood Elf with archery perks. I decided to branch out and start making my way around the vanilla races. I did not give her any armor or weapons due to the fact as there are so many mods to choose from on those aspects. I gave her a dark elf voice so that she will have a semi-lore friendly dialog[/font]. [font=Comic Sans MS]She can be found in [color=#6aa84f][size=3]Jorrvaskr[/size][/color] on the ground floor.[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS]Screenshots were taken with her wearing the [color=#B45F06][size=3]Gwelda Vampire[/size][/color][/font][color=#B45F06][size=3] outfit[/size][/color][font=Comic Sans MS]. Thanks to [color=#ff0000][size=4]nsk13[/size][/color][/font] [font=Comic Sans MS]for his wonderful outfits.[/font] [font=Comic Sans MS]Outfit is not included.Sorry.[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS]Please feel free to voice your opinions about her and post as many screenshots as you prefer.

[center]There is also a new revamped [color=#ffd966][size=4]Zoe[/size][/color] done by [color=#6d9eeb][size=4]fantasy19[/size][/color][color=#6d9eeb] [color=#ffffff]that you can add to my version[/color] [color=#ffffff]if you desire. [/color][/color][/center][center]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59758/?[/center]
[center][color=#ffd966][u][size=4]Installation[/size][/u][/color]
Use the [color=#e69138]Nexus Mod Manager[/color] or download manual-path: skyrim/data[/center][center][/center][center][color=#ffd966][u][size=3]Credits[/size]
[/u][/color][size=3][color=#ffe599][size=4]Hellosanta[/size][/color]- SG Hair Pack
[color=#45818e][size=4]HHaleyy[/size][/color]- Fair Skin Complexion
[/size][size=4][color=#c27ba0]MissShazira[/color]-[/size][size=3]Porcelain Vampire Skin[/size]
[size=4][color=#6fa8dc]Lograam[/color]- The Eyes of Beauty[/size]
[size=4][color=#6aa84f]Hvergelmir[/color]- Brows[/size]
[size=4][color=#900000]dimon99[/color]- UNP Skinny Body
[color=#d5a6bd]Caliente[/color]-CBBE Body
[/size][size=3][color=#7F6000][size=4]xp32[/size][/color]-UNPB-TBBP Body[/size]
[size=4][color=#dd7e6b]Natilde[/color]- Creating Standalone Followers[/size]
[size=4][color=#000000]Bethesda[/color]- Skyrim


[/size]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=3]This mod can also be used in Skyrim Special Edition.[/size][/color][/font][/center]

[center][/center][/font]
author: lewbob
